name: block-library
description: A collection of core blocks for the Gutenberg block editor.
author: Roberto Di Marco

scripts.build:blocks: find blocks -name 'src' -execdir npx @wordpress/scripts build './src/index.js' --output-path='./build' \; && find blocks -name 'src' -execdir node ../../copy-json.js $(basename $(pwd)) \;
scripts.start:test1: wp-scripts start blocks/test1/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/test1/build/ && cd blocks/test1 && node ../../copy-json.js test1
scripts.build:test1: wp-scripts build blocks/test1/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/test1/build/ && cd blocks/test1 && node ../../copy-json.js test1
scripts.start:test2: wp-scripts start blocks/test2/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/test2/build/ && cd blocks/test2 && node ../../copy-json.js test2
scripts.build:test2: wp-scripts build blocks/test2/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/test2/build/ && cd blocks/test2 && node ../../copy-json.js test2

scripts.build:test3: wp-scripts build blocks/test3/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/test3/build/ && cd blocks/test3 && node ../../copy-json.js test3
